titleStmt.title: Commonwealth of Kentucky v. Robert Rodges, Archibald Cavennaugh, and Williamn Hacher, Indictment
CWG7377

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p:
Owsley Circuit Court
The Commonwealth of Kentucky
against } Indictment
Robert Rodges Archibald Cavennaugh & Williamn Hacher

The Grand Jury of owsly County in the name and by the authority of the commonwealth of Kentucky accuses Robt Rodges Archibald Cavenaugh & William Hacher -- Comited as follows viz the said Robt Rodges Archibald Cavenaugh & William Hacher did in the County aforesaid on the first day of Nov 1865 Feloniously forcible and by puting R B Jamison in fear of some immediate to his person take from said Jamison agnst his will goods & merchandise to the amount of eight hundred Dollers werth One hors the property and in the possesion of the said Jamison all of the value of Nine hundred Dollers against the peace & dignity of the commonwealth of Kentucky

H F Finly Comlth atty
Witnes) R B Jamison
Filed 4 Nov 1865

A Copy Attest
S B McGuire c o c c
